short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the Ezy Screenshot Chrome™ extension to capture, record and print your screen via a widget on your browser toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture the visible part of your screen, and record your computer screen with this easy-to-use tool. Save or get shareable links for screen recordings (up to 50 MB) and screenshots that you can send to your family, friends, or colleagues. You can also print screenshots.                              

How to use the screen-capturing tool:
- Add the extension to your Chrome™ browser
- Pin the extension to your browser toolbar for quick access to the screen-capturing widget
- Open the widget and choose ‘Screen Record’ or ‘Screen Capture’
- To record, select a window or the entire screen from the dropdown, navigate to the desired window or screen, and the recording will begin in 10 seconds
- To take a screenshot, select the window you want to capture. The screenshot will capture the visible part of your screen
- Click ‘Print Image’ to print the screenshot

We welcome your ideas and suggestions to improve this extension. Please note that you can uninstall the extension if you are dissatisfied with the product.

Upon clicking the button above, you confirm that you have read & agree to the Terms of Service & Privacy Policy and consent to install this Chrome™ extension.
